mapper.insert: insert into car (id, numberring, license_plate, route_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{numberring,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licensePlate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{routeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
